Question: Both of this person's parents were strong-willed individuals with idiosyncratic interests that they passed on to him.
Hints: But, as with any architect, this person worked in a collaborative process and drew his ideas from the work of others.
Simon & Garfunkel recorded "So Long, this person" as a tribute to this person.
In 1928, this person wrote an essay on glass in which he compared it to the mirrors of nature: lakes, rivers and ponds.
